mapper.select: SELECT a.mem_id,c.cp_id, b.cp_qty, b.cp_sts, DATE_FORMAT(b.cp_del_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H시까지') AS cp_del_date, c.cp_name, c.cash_rate, c.min_amt, c.max_disc_amt, c.type FROM member AS a JOIN `mem-coupon` AS b ON a.mem_id = b.mem_id JOIN coupon AS c ON b.cp_id = c.cp_id where b.cp_sts = 'UNUSED' AND a.mem_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE `mem-coupon` SET cp_qty = #{cp_qty}, cp_sts = #{cp_sts}, md_date = current_timestamp WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} AND cp_id = #{cp_id}
